text:
Jeff Adachi (August 29, 1959 – February 22, 2019) was an American politician. He was born in Sacramento, California. He was the elected Public Defender of San Francisco from 2003 until his death in 2019. He was a candidate for Mayor of San Francisco in 2011. He was a member of the Democratic Party.
Adachi died from a heart attack in San Francisco on February 22, 2019, aged 59.
